name: Roundabout Free
description:
Roundabout is an original arcade game that's fun for everyone in the family!

In Roundabout you place your finger anywhere on the screen and drag to move, around the arena, this is no easy task as the arena is spinning around and popping out black dots that you need to avoid. These black dots spawn faster and faster while the arena itself is spinning out of control.

To really make Roundabout as challenging and fun as possible, i've added "specials" with unique mechanics and original bosses that really take this game to the next level!

Are you up for the Roundabout challenge?

Show your friends and family that your reflexes are the best
